title: PHP Notice:  Undefined offset 1 in XML.php when running phpunit
body:
I have a lot of this error after I upgrade the phpunit to the last version:

```
PHP Notice:  Undefined offset: 1 in /usr/share/php/PHPUnit/Util/XML.php on line 73
PHP Stack trace:
PHP   1. {main}() /usr/bin/phpunit:0
PHP   2. PHPUnit_TextUI_Command::main() /usr/bin/phpunit:46
PHP   3. PHPUnit_TextUI_Command->run() /usr/share/php/PHPUnit/TextUI/Command.php:129
PHP   4. PHPUnit_TextUI_TestRunner->doRun() /usr/share/php/PHPUnit/TextUI/Command.php:176
PHP   5. PHPUnit_Framework_TestSuite->run() /usr/share/php/PHPUnit/TextUI/TestRunner.php:346
PHP   6. PHPUnit_Framework_TestSuite->run() /usr/share/php/PHPUnit/Framework/TestSuite.php:705
PHP   7. PHPUnit_Framework_TestSuite->runTest() /usr/share/php/PHPUnit/Framework/TestSuite.php:745
PHP   8. PHPUnit_Framework_TestCase->run() /usr/share/php/PHPUnit/Framework/TestSuite.php:775
PHP   9. PHPUnit_Util_PHP->runJob() /usr/share/php/PHPUnit/Framework/TestCase.php:767
PHP  10. PHPUnit_Util_PHP->processChildResult() /usr/share/php/PHPUnit/Util/PHP.php:194
PHP  11. PHPUnit_Framework_TestResult->addError() /usr/share/php/PHPUnit/Util/PHP.php:245
PHP  12. PHPUnit_Util_Log_JUnit->addError() /usr/share/php/PHPUnit/Framework/TestResult.php:259
PHP  13. PHPUnit_Util_XML::prepareString() /usr/share/php/PHPUnit/Util/Log/JUnit.php:179
PHP  14. preg_replace_callback() /usr/share/php/PHPUnit/Util/XML.php:78
PHP  15. PHPUnit_Util_XML::{closure:/usr/share/php/PHPUnit/Util/XML.php:70-74}() /usr/share/php/PHPUnit/Util/XML.php:78
```

in PHPUnit_Util_XML::prepareString, I'm tring to dump the $matches,what I got is:

```
array(1) {
  [0] =>
  string(1) "\033"
}
```

seems like there's no $matches[1]
